rComments: great very nice teacher.  clear and fair with grading.  Very calm and patient.  Can relate to students well.  wish I could have him for all my math classes!

excellent teacher.  works through entire problems. doesn't assume you allready know how to do things. Can sometimes move a little too fast but generally clear and well paced.  I despise (and have struggled with) math always but Ben's class was great.  Very reasonable homework assignments.  Uses "CourseCompass" math program which is really wonderful
